review: First, item was supposed to arrive on a Wednesday and date kept getting pushed back u til it finally arrived on Saturday. Despite title saying newest model I still had to download the latest software as it was not up to date. Then the box would not remember my wifi information and kept dropping the signal. If you have many wifi devices and things like Bose with wireless speakers this just gets too much interference and doesn't work so we returned it. I gave it a good effort however but just couldn't get t to work.
author: Alesha M. Desharnais "Mom of 2"

review: Apple TV is amazing but I think its pretty lame that I can ONLY watch tv shows and movies on the various apps (CBS, FX, ABC etc) if I already have cable and can verify my cable provider is valid. The whole point for me was to get Apple TV so I could cancel cable and save $70/month. Everything eventually comes online and with Apple airplay its easy to watch stuff online from my macbook on my flatscreen, but still; the apps should be open to anyone with or without a cable subscription.
author: Ssavory

review: Awesome product. My expectations for it were completely blown away. I recommend that if you have a TV, buy this product.
author: Matthew

review: Primarily used this device to wirelessly sync my iPad to the HD 1080P LED TV in the living room. Streaming through Airplay was as seemless as a press of a button on the touchscreen. Very useful for watching high definition movies and listening to music from the iPad or iPhone. A must for households with multiple Apple devices.
author: MILK-STACHE PIKACHU

review: I love my Apple TV!  I use this multiple times a week.  I have Amazon Prime and we stream from our smartphones with few issues.  You can also play Youtube videos, show pictures and stream other services like HBO Go/Hulu/Netflix and even rent new releases.  I have seriously considered cancelling my cable because of this device!  I may need to get one for our other TV!
author: Angela James

review: Great box . Easiest device to use. Love it.
author: Cynthia Saypol
